text: flmma ja' rasul almalikat balhdyat 'iilaa slyman, qal mstnkrana dhlk mthdthana b'aneum allah elyh: atmdwnny bmal tardytan ly? fama 'aetani allah min alnubuat walmalik walamwal alkathirat khayr wa'afdal mimaa aetakm, bal 'antum aladhin tafrahun balhdyt alty tuhda 'ilykm; lankm 'ahl mfakhrt bialdunya wmkathrt bha
